text: Johnny Kelley (1907–2004) was an American long-distance runner who won the Boston Marathon in 1935 and 1945. Johnny Kelley or Kelly may also refer to: *Johnny Kelly or John J. Kelley (1930–2011), American long-distance runner who won the 1957 Boston Marathon *Johnny Kelly (born 1968), American drummer ==See also== *John Kelley (disambiguation) *John Kelly (disambiguation)
title: Johnny Kelley (disambiguation)
